panels.description:
Number of processes in `dnsmasq` container.

`dnsmasq` has a hard coded limit of 20 child processes so if this reaches 22 it will severely affect latency.
panels.title: dnsmasq processes

targets.expr: sum(rate(kubedns_dnsmasq_hits{job=~"$Job", pod=~"$Pod"}[1m])) by (pod) / (sum(rate(kubedns_dnsmasq_misses{job=~"$Job", pod=~"$Pod"}[1m])) by (pod) + sum(rate(kubedns_dnsmasq_hits{job=~"$Job", pod=~"$Pod"}[1m])) by (pod))
